title: (Senior) Research Executive (m/f/d)
content:
Allow us to introduce ourselves
Hello there! Weâ€™re Appinio, the fastest (and coolest) market research platform. On a mission to make the world a little more fact-based, we help companies understand how consumers think and make better data-driven decisions.
We started out in Hamburg back in 2014 but weâ€™re now humbled to call the world our playground, with over 200 employees spread across 25 cities (weâ€™re remote-first), 2000+ international clients and a panel reach of 7 million, globally.
Want to be a part of the Appinio movement? ðŸš€

Your mission as a (Senior) Research Executive
We are looking for a (Senior) Research Executive (m/f/d) to join our globally growing Research Operations Team. In your role, you will coordinate and manage our diverse projects to help our clients succeed with cutting-edge market research solutions.
Your passion for collaborative working and your numerical skills are needed for a variety of responsibilities that are waiting for you in your new role. In close cooperation with other functions, you will design, test and monitor surveys that keep the needs of our clients in focus.
What youâ€™ll be doing

Operational implementation and coordination of market research projects: Programming, controlling, and monitoring of surveys while also coordinating tasks within project teams
Support in the design and testing of feedback on questionnaires
Programming of questionnaires in different languages and monitoring of the surveys
Supporting Research Consultants in creating In-depth analysis and reporting of results, where necessary
Close cooperation with our Sales and Research Consulting teams for the implementation of initial projects of (new) customers
Checking the feasibilities of target groups and markets
Constantly improving processes within the research operations team and the operational market research process in general
Support the product team by identifying potential product improvements that benefit our clients and the research operations team
Feedback and development of junior research executives, enabling them to deliver high-quality results in every project

You will thrive in this role if

You have a degree in psychology, business administration, market research, statistics or similar data-related fields
You have at least 2-3 years of experience in market research (preferably in operative tasks, sampling and project management)
You have excellent project management skills, able to maintain an overview while working on numerous projects, and maintain a positive energy to share with your team
You are native in German and fluent in English. Knowledge of Spanish and/or French is a plus
You have very good knowledge in Excel and PowerPoint
You have excellent communication skills, hands-on mentality, pragmatism and proactivity, as well as an affinity for numbers, data - and team work

Whatâ€™s in it for you?

Flexibility Policy - meaning there is no hard cap on the number of vacation days
Work-from-anywhere Policy

You have the chance to develop our amazing product from one of the countries where we operate: Spain, France, Germany, Portugal, Netherland or the UK
You have the chance to work outside of your country of residence for a maximum of 180 days per year, given that you have a valid work permit for that country

Udemy L&D Platform - full access to 22,000+ courses and certifications to deepen your knowledge as your career progresses
All the hardware you need and your own MacBook
In case you're located in Hamburg or Berlin, you'll get a Deutschlandticket or access to a mobility budget with the RYDES app to get you to and from the office space
In case you're located in Hamburg you'll get access to our beautiful office in Hamburg's city center - terrace and BBQ included ;-)
In case you are located in Germany or Spain, you will have access to a Subsidized Urban Sports Club membership
In case you're located in Berlin, you will have access to our co-working space to get together with our fellow Appinioneers





This post not only outlines our ideal candidate but also serves as an inspiration for what this role can evolve into. Even if you consider yourself an 80% fit but have a genuine passion for this position, we encourage you to apply. We're eager to hear from individuals who share our enthusiasm.
Appinio is an equal opportunity employer. All applicants will be considered for employment without attention to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, veteran or disability status.
